name: Addon Packager Proxy
description: Turns GitHub tags into WowInterface uploads through CurseForce and magic!

GIST_ID.description: ID of a gist containing information about your addons. More info: https://github.com/p3lim/addon-packager-proxy/wiki/AddonList

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key used for GitHub webhooks. Treat this like a password.

WOWI_API_TOKEN.description: Authentication token used to access the WoWInterface.com API.

QUERY_MAX_ATTEMPTS.description: Number of attempts to query CurseForge for an updated file. Min: 2, Max: 10.

QUERY_DELAY_SECONDS.description: Number of seconds between each attempt to query CurseForge. Min: 30, Max: 300.
